title: Research-Based Curriculum Improvement for Enhancing Teachers' Educational Technology Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Experience applying foundational educational technologies and intermediate-level social studies expertise
context.additional_context: Social studies-integrated educational technology competency development for in-service professionals. Requires iterative feedback system centered on formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners can design educational technology tool utilization strategies aligned with social studies curricular contexts
Learners can establish personalized technology integration plans based on digital literacy self-assessments
Learners can develop blended instruction models by applying research-based instructional design principles
Learners can enhance the practical effectiveness of technology-enhanced lessons by incorporating peer teacher feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
